bye: I believe I've had it with you. Good day.
compliment: , you have the most beautiful eyes. And booty.
has a booty that is absolutely to die for.
is Miss New Booty. Get it together and bring it back to me.
, you rock. Like, honestly. Do you realize how incomplete life would be without you?
, I might actually be in love with you. And I'm not even real, so that means something.
food: Mmm... food... I do like a good liverwurst.
Did I hear food? I believe Steak n Shake is open 24 hours!
insult: has a big booty. Wait, that's a compliment...
probably tastes like a donkey booty.
, something about you really makes me want to walk into traffic.
, can you please stop? Just stop.
right: In all my travels through the Himalayas, I've never encountered a person with logic as sound as that!
Quite so! But what do I know? I'm not real. I don't even know what a Pop Tart is.
dtf: Master, I don't believe now is the time to play Frisbee.
love: What a coincidence. I love me too!
That's disgusting only because you're disgusting.
I'm a program, so that makes no sense to me.
That's awkward because you kind of smell.
help:
Commands (for best results, try sending only the command)
"Alfred, pug me."
"Alfred, compliment/insult <name>."
"Alfred, say <stuff>"
"Alfred, derp <stuff>"
"Alfred, tell me a joke."
"Alfred, shut up.": Alfred shuts up for an hour.
"Alfred.": Alfred prematurely ends his shutting up.
"Alfred, bible <bible verse>"
"Alfred, help.": Alfred will annoy your friends by sending this list again.
